New Records: Rohit Sharma scored India's previous fastest World Cup century, from 72 balls, in 1983 against Zimbabwe. Rohit broke the record by nine deliveries.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's focus on not getting carried away with the occasion when facing Pakistan
Hashmatullah Shahidi's regret over back-to-back wickets and the need to build a partnership
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a record-breaking innings for Rohit Sharma
Kohli hit his 50th ODI fifty in front of his home crowd
Others: The match took place at Arun Jaitley Stadium, Delhi
The match was part of ICC Cricket World Cup 2023
